summary: Ruby SDK needs support for activity reset functionality, similar to what's available in other Temporal SDKs. This feature is partially implemented in PR #283 but requires a released dev server and test confirmation before being marked complete.
userImpact: Ruby SDK users cannot reset activities during testing and development, limiting testing capabilities compared to other Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement activity reset functionality in the Ruby SDK, with implementation partially done in PR #283
resolutionDetails: Partially implemented in PR #283; awaiting released dev server with functionality and test confirmation
keyQuote: Half of this is done in #283, but not marking this complete until we can have a test confirming behavior
